location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order. There are notes at the end of the file (folios 6-7). The notes refer to documents within the file.
The foliation is in pencil in the top right corner of each folio, and is encircled. The numbering starts on the cover with 1, then 1a, 1b, 1c and ends on the back cover, with 8.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Bahrain Petroleum Company Limited (BAPCO) representative and the Political Agent at Bahrain on the presence of marine borers in the Persian Gulf.
